articles.title: France virus death toll goes beyond 23000 - The Cairns Post
articles.description: The number of people who have died from coronavirus infection in France has risen by 437 to 23,293, the health ministry says.
articles.content:
The number of people who have died from coronavirus infection in France has risen by 437 to 23,293, the health ministry says.
